name: Think and Jump - Hardcore
description:
Hey.

Think And Jump, is a 3D Hardcore Platformer game.

The game run only on Mac, sorry PC users... I'm fixing the problem.

Controls : 

Z : Walk

Q : Walk on the Left

D : Walk on the Right

S : Step back

Space : Jump

LeftShift + Z : Run

When your running, you jump higher and further.

/!\ WARNING /!\

The game is very difficult, but you can finish it. Just, don't rage. ;-)

Minimum Requirements :

  • Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo 
  • Graphics : Geforce GTX 9400M
  • Memory : 4Go

Recommended requirements : [~144 FPS]

  • Processor : 2,5 GHz Intel Core I5
  • Memory : 8Go DDR3
  • Graphics : AMD Radeon HD 6750M 512Mo
